verses.verse: Then <WG1161> he called his twelve disciples together,<WG4779> <WG848> <WG1427> <WG3101> and gave<WG1325> them<WG846> power<WG1411> and<WG2532> authority<WG1849> over<WG1909> all<WG3956> devils,<WG1140> and<WG2532> to cure<WG2323> diseases.<WG3554>
And <WG2532> he sent<WG649> them<WG846> to preach<WG2784> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> to heal<WG2390> the<WG3588> sick.<WG770>

And <WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Take <WG142> nothing<WG3367> for<WG1519> your journey,<WG3598> neither<WG3383> staves,<WG4464> nor<WG3383> scrip,<WG4082> neither<WG3383> bread,<WG740> neither<WG3383> money;<WG694> neither<WG3383> have<WG2192> two<WG1417> coats<WG5509> apiece. <WG303>
And <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG302> house <WG3614> ye enter<WG1525> into,<WG1519> there<WG1563> abide,<WG3306> and<WG2532> thence<WG1564> depart. <WG1831>

And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3745> <WG302> will not<WG3361> receive<WG1209> you,<WG5209> when ye go<WG1831> out of<WG575> that<WG1565> city,<WG4172> shake off<WG660> the<WG3588> very<WG2532> dust<WG2868> from<WG575> your<WG5216> feet<WG4228> for<WG1519> a testimony<WG3142> against<WG1909> them. <WG846>
And <WG1161> they departed,<WG1831> and went<WG1330> through<WG2596> the<WG3588> towns,<WG2968> preaching the gospel,<WG2097> and<WG2532> healing<WG2323> everywhere.<WG3837>

Now <WG1161> Herod<WG2264> the<WG3588> tetrarch<WG5076> heard<WG191> of all<WG3956> that was done<WG1096> by<WG5259> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he was perplexed,<WG1280> because that it was said<WG3004> of<WG5259> some,<WG5100> that<WG3754> John<WG2491> was risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead;<WG3498>

And <WG1161> of<WG5259> some,<WG5100> that<WG3754> Elijah<WG2243> had appeared;<WG5316> and<WG1161> of others,<WG243> that<WG3754> one<WG1520> of the<WG3588> old<WG744> prophets<WG4396> was risen again.<WG450>

And <WG2532> Herod<WG2264> said,<WG2036> John<WG2491> have I<WG1473> beheaded:<WG607> but<WG1161> who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this,<WG3778> of<WG4012> whom<WG3739> I<WG1473> hear<WG191> such things?<WG5108> And<WG2532> he desired<WG2212> to see<WG1492> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> apostles,<WG652> when they were returned,<WG5290> told<WG1334> him<WG846> all that<WG3745> they had done.<WG4160> And<WG2532> he took<WG3880> them,<WG846> and went aside<WG5298> privately<WG2596> <WG2398> into<WG1519> a desert<WG2048> place<WG5117> belonging to the city<WG4172> called<WG2564> Bethsaida.<WG966>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> people,<WG3793> when they knew<WG1097> it, followed<WG190> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he received<WG1209> them,<WG846> and spake<WG2980> unto them<WG846> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> healed<WG2390> them that had<WG2192> need<WG5532> of healing.<WG2322>

And <WG1161> when the<WG3588> day<WG2250> began<WG756> to wear away,<WG2827> then<WG1161> came<WG4334> the<WG3588> twelve,<WG1427> and said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Send the multitude away,<WG630> <WG3588> <WG3793> that<WG2443> they may go<WG565> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> towns<WG2968> and<WG2532> country<WG68> round about,<WG2945> and lodge,<WG2647> and<WG2532> get<WG2147> victuals:<WG1979> for<WG3754> we are<WG2070> here<WG5602> in<WG1722> a desert<WG2048> place.<WG5117>

But <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Give <WG1325> ye<WG5210> them<WG846> to eat. <WG5315> And<WG1161> they<WG3588> said,<WG2036> We<WG2254> have<WG1526> no<WG3756> more<WG4119> but<WG2228> five<WG4002> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> two<WG1417> fishes;<WG2486> except<WG1509> we<WG2249> should go<WG4198> and buy<WG59> meat<WG1033> for<WG1519> all<WG3956> this<WG5126> people.<WG2992>

For <WG1063> they were<WG2258> about<WG5616> five thousand<WG4000> men.<WG435> And<WG1161> he<WG3588> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101> Make them<WG846> sit down<WG2625> by<WG303> fifties<WG4004> in a company. <WG2828>
And <WG2532> they did<WG4160> so,<WG3779> and<WG2532> made them all<WG537> sit down.<WG347>

Then <WG1161> he took<WG2983> the<WG3588> five<WG4002> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> fishes,<WG2486> and looking up<WG308> to<WG1519> heaven,<WG3772> he blessed<WG2127> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> broke,<WG2622> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> to the<WG3588> disciples<WG3101> to set before<WG3908> the<WG3588> multitude.<WG3793>

And <WG2532> they did eat,<WG5315> and<WG2532> were all<WG3956> filled:<WG5526> and<WG2532> there was taken up<WG142> of fragments<WG2801> that remained<WG4052> to them<WG846> twelve<WG1427> baskets.<WG2894>

And <WG2532> it came to pass,<WG1096> as he<WG846> was<WG1511> alone<WG2651> praying,<WG4336> his disciples<WG3101> were with<WG4895> him:<WG846> and<WG2532> he asked<WG1905> them,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> Whom <WG5101> say<WG3004> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> that I<WG3165> am? <WG1511>

<WG1161> They<WG3588> answering<WG611> said,<WG2036> John<WG2491> the<WG3588> Baptist;<WG910> but<WG1161> some<WG243> say, Elijah;<WG2243> and<WG1161> others<WG243> say, that<WG3754> one<WG5100> of the<WG3588> old<WG744> prophets<WG4396> is risen again.<WG450>

<WG1161> He said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> But <WG1161> whom<WG5101> say<WG3004> ye<WG5210> that I<WG3165> am? <WG1511> <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> answering<WG611> said,<WG2036> The<WG3588> Christ<WG5547> of God.<WG2316>
And <WG1161> he<WG3588> straitly charged<WG2008> them,<WG846> and commanded<WG3853> them to tell<WG2036> no man<WG3367> that thing;<WG5124>

Saying, <WG2036> The <WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> suffer<WG3958> many things,<WG4183> and<WG2532> be rejected<WG593> of<WG575> the<WG3588> elders<WG4245> and<WG2532> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> be slain,<WG615> and<WG2532> be raised<WG1453> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> day. <WG2250>

And <WG1161> he said<WG3004> to<WG4314> them all,<WG3956> If <WG1487> any<WG5100> man will<WG2309> come<WG2064> after<WG3694> me,<WG3450> let him deny<WG533> himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> take up<WG142> his<WG848> cross<WG4716> daily, <WG2596> <WG2250> and <WG2532> follow<WG190> me. <WG3427>

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will <WG2309> save<WG4982> his<WG848> life<WG5590> shall lose<WG622> it: <WG846> but<WG1161> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will lose<WG622> his<WG848> life<WG5590> for my sake, <WG1752> <WG1700> the same<WG3778> shall save<WG4982> it. <WG846>
For <WG1063> what<WG5101> is a man<WG444> advantaged,<WG5623> if he gain<WG2770> the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> world,<WG2889> and<WG1161> lose<WG622> himself,<WG1438> or<WG2228> be cast away? <WG2210>

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall be ashamed<WG1870> of me<WG3165> and<WG2532> of my<WG1699> words,<WG3056> of him<WG5126> shall the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be ashamed,<WG1870> when<WG3752> he shall come<WG2064> in<WG1722> his own<WG848> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> in his Father's,<WG3962> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> holy<WG40> angels. <WG32>

But <WG1161> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> of a truth,<WG230> there be<WG1526> some<WG5100> standing<WG2476> here,<WG5602> which<WG3739> shall not<WG3364> taste<WG1089> of death,<WG2288> till <WG2193> <WG302> they see<WG1492> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God. <WG2316>

And <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> about<WG5616> eight<WG3638> days<WG2250> after<WG3326> these<WG5128> sayings,<WG3056> he<WG2532> took<WG3880> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> and<WG2532> James,<WG2385> and went up<WG305> into<WG1519> a mountain<WG3735> to pray.<WG4336>

And <WG2532> as<WG1096> he<WG846> prayed,<WG4336> the<WG3588> fashion<WG1491> of his<WG846> countenance<WG4383> was altered,<WG2087> and<WG2532> his<WG846> raiment<WG2441> was white<WG3022> and glistering.<WG1823>
And, <WG2532> behold,<WG2400> there talked with<WG4814> him<WG846> two<WG1417> men,<WG444> which<WG3748> were<WG2258> Moses<WG3475> and<WG2532> Elijah: <WG2243>
Who <WG3739> appeared<WG3700> in<WG1722> glory,<WG1391> and spake<WG3004> of his<WG846> decease<WG1841> which<WG3739> he should<WG3195> accomplish<WG4137> at<WG1722> Jerusalem.<WG2419>

But <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> they<WG3588> that were with<WG4862> him<WG846> were<WG2258> heavy<WG916> with sleep:<WG5258> and<WG1161> when they were awake,<WG1235> they saw<WG1492> his<WG846> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> two<WG1417> men<WG444> that stood with<WG4921> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> it came to pass,<WG1096> as they<WG846> departed<WG1316> from<WG575> him,<WG846> Peter<WG4074> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> Master,<WG1988> it is<WG2076> good<WG2570> for us<WG2248> to be<WG1511> here:<WG5602> and<WG2532> let us make<WG4160> three<WG5140> tabernacles;<WG4633> one<WG3391> for thee,<WG4671> and<WG2532> one<WG3391> for Moses,<WG3475> and<WG2532> one<WG3391> for Elijah:<WG2243> not<WG3361> knowing<WG1492> what<WG3739> he said.<WG3004>

While <WG1161> he<WG846> thus<WG5023> spake,<WG3004> there came<WG1096> a cloud,<WG3507> and<WG2532> overshadowed<WG1982> them:<WG846> and<WG1161> they feared<WG5399> as they<WG1565> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> cloud.<WG3507>
And <WG2532> there came<WG1096> a voice<WG5456> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> cloud,<WG3507> saying,<WG3004> This<WG3778> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son:<WG5207> hear<WG191> him.<WG846>

And <WG2532> when the<WG3588> voice<WG5456> was past,<WG1096> Jesus<WG2424> was found<WG2147> alone.<WG3441> And<WG2532> they<WG846> kept it close,<WG4601> and<WG2532> told<WG518> no man<WG3762> in<WG1722> those<WG1565> days<WG2250> any of those things<WG3762> which<WG3739> they had seen.<WG3708>

And <WG1161> it came to pass,<WG1096> that on<WG1722> the<WG3588> next<WG1836> day,<WG2250> when they<WG846> were come down<WG2718> from<WG575> the<WG3588> hill,<WG3735> much<WG4183> people<WG3793> met<WG4876> him.<WG846>

And, <WG2532> behold,<WG2400> a man<WG435> of<WG575> the<WG3588> company<WG3793> cried out,<WG310> saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1320> I beseech<WG1189> thee,<WG4675> look<WG1914> upon<WG1909> my<WG3450> son:<WG5207> for<WG3754> he is<WG2076> mine<WG3427> only child.<WG3439>

And, <WG2532> lo,<WG2400> a spirit<WG4151> taketh<WG2983> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> he suddenly<WG1810> crieth out;<WG2896> and<WG2532> it teareth<WG4682> him<WG846> that he foameth again,<WG3326> <WG876> and<WG2532> bruising<WG4937> him<WG846> hardly<WG3425> departeth<WG672> from<WG575> him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> I besought<WG1189> thy<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> to<WG2443> cast him out;<WG1544> <WG846> and<WG2532> they could<WG1410> not.<WG3756>

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said,<WG2036> O <WG5599> faithless<WG571> and<WG2532> perverse<WG1294> generation,<WG1074> how long <WG2193> <WG4219> shall I be<WG2071> with<WG4314> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> suffer<WG430> you?<WG5216> Bring<WG4317> thy<WG4675> son<WG5207> hither. <WG5602>

And <WG1161> as he<WG846> was yet<WG2089> a coming,<WG4334> the<WG3588> devil<WG1140> threw him down,<WG4486> <WG846> and<WG2532> tore<WG4952> him. And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> the<WG3588> unclean<WG169> spirit,<WG4151> and<WG2532> healed<WG2390> the<WG3588> child,<WG3816> and<WG2532> delivered him again<WG591> <WG846> to his<WG846> father.<WG3962>

And <WG1161> they were all<WG3956> amazed<WG1605> at<WG1909> the<WG3588> mighty power<WG3168> of God.<WG2316> But<WG1161> while they wondered<WG2296> every one<WG3956> at<WG1909> all things<WG3956> which<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> did,<WG4160> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101>

Let <WG5210> these<WG5128> sayings<WG3056> sink down<WG5087> into<WG1519> your<WG5216> ears: <WG3775> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall<WG3195> be delivered<WG3860> into<WG1519> the hands<WG5495> of men. <WG444>

But <WG1161> they<WG3588> understood not<WG50> this<WG5124> saying,<WG4487> and<WG2532> it was<WG2258> hid<WG3871> from<WG575> them,<WG846> that<WG2443> they perceived<WG143> it<WG846> not:<WG3361> and<WG2532> they feared<WG5399> to ask<WG2065> him<WG846> of<WG4012> that<WG5127> saying.<WG4487>
Then <WG1161> there arose<WG1525> a reasoning<WG1261> among<WG1722> them,<WG846> which<WG5101> of them<WG846> should be<WG1498> greatest.<WG3187>
And <WG1161> Jesus,<WG2424> perceiving<WG1492> the<WG3588> thought<WG1261> of their<WG846> heart,<WG2588> took<WG1949> a child,<WG3813> and set<WG2476> him<WG846> by<WG3844> him,<WG1438>

And <WG2532> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall receive<WG1209> this<WG5124> child<WG3813> in<WG1909> my<WG3450> name<WG3686> receiveth<WG1209> me: <WG1691> and<WG2532> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> shall receive<WG1209> me<WG1691> receiveth<WG1209> him that sent<WG649> me: <WG3165> for<WG1063> he that is<WG5225> least<WG3398> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> all,<WG3956> the same<WG3778> shall be<WG2071> great. <WG3173>

And <WG1161> John<WG2491> answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> Master,<WG1988> we saw<WG1492> one<WG5100> casting out<WG1544> devils<WG1140> in<WG1909> thy<WG4675> name;<WG3686> and<WG2532> we forbade<WG2967> him,<WG846> because<WG3754> he followeth<WG190> not<WG3756> with<WG3326> us.<WG2257>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> Forbid <WG2967> him not: <WG3361> for<WG1063> he<WG3739> that is<WG2076> not<WG3756> against<WG2596> us<WG2257> is<WG2076> for<WG5228> us. <WG2257>

And <WG1161> it came to pass,<WG1096> when the<WG3588> time<WG2250> was come<WG4845> that<WG2532> he<WG846> should be received up,<WG354> he<WG846> steadfastly set<WG4741> his<WG848> face<WG4383> to go<WG4198> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2419>

And <WG2532> sent<WG649> messengers<WG32> before<WG4253> his<WG848> face:<WG4383> and<WG2532> they went,<WG4198> and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a village<WG2968> of the Samaritans,<WG4541> to<WG5620> make ready<WG2090> for him.<WG846>
And <WG2532> they did not<WG3756> receive<WG1209> him,<WG846> because<WG3754> his<WG846> face<WG4383> was<WG2258> as though he would go<WG4198> to<WG1519> Jerusalem.<WG2419>

And <WG1161> when his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> James<WG2385> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> saw<WG1492> this, they said,<WG2036> Lord,<WG2962> wilt<WG2309> thou that we command<WG2036> fire<WG4442> to come down<WG2597> from<WG575> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> consume<WG355> them,<WG846> even<WG2532> as<WG5613> Elijah<WG2243> did?<WG4160>
But <WG1161> he turned,<WG4762> and rebuked<WG2008> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> Ye know<WG1492> not<WG3756> what manner<WG3634> of spirit<WG4151> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> of.

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> is not<WG3756> come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> men's<WG444> lives,<WG5590> but<WG235> to save<WG4982> them. And<WG2532> they went<WG4198> to<WG1519> another<WG2087> village.<WG2968>

And <WG1161> it came to pass,<WG1096> that, as they<WG846> went<WG4198> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> way,<WG3598> a certain<WG5100> man said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him,<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> I will follow<WG190> thee<WG4671> whithersoever<WG3699> <WG302> thou goest.<WG565>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Foxes <WG258> have<WG2192> holes,<WG5454> and<WG2532> birds<WG4071> of the<WG3588> air<WG3772> have nests;<WG2682> but<WG1161> the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> hath<WG2192> not<WG3756> where<WG4226> to lay<WG2827> his head. <WG2776>

And <WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> another,<WG2087> Follow <WG190> me. <WG3427> But<WG1161> he<WG3588> said,<WG2036> Lord,<WG2962> suffer<WG2010> me<WG3427> first<WG4412> to go<WG565> and bury<WG2290> my<WG3450> father.<WG3962>
